Description: Less Annoying CRM allows users to track and organize their contacts and leads without the headache. Simple, easy, powerful, less annoying.
Name: Less Annoying CRM

Methods.Name: List Pipeline Reports
Methods.Description: Lists reports from a specified pipeline.
